Description: This cloudformation template creates resources required to set up a golden ami pipeline.(fdp-1o82smtoh)

productName.Description: ProductName-ProductVersion combination of the product for which you intend to use the pipeline. You get to override this later when you trigger automation workflow.

productOSAndVersion.Description: Operating system name and OS version. You get to override this later when you trigger automation workflow.

buildVersion.Description: Build-Version corresponding to your product. Note - This is just a default value, you get to override this later when you trigger automation workflow.

cidrVPC.Description: An available CIDR block for creating a new VPC. The size of the VPC should be big enough to hold instances of all your golden AMIs at a time
cidrVPC.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

cidrPrivateSubnet.Description: An available CIDR block for creating a new VPC. The size of the VPC should be big enough to hold instances of all your golden AMIs at a time
cidrPrivateSubnet.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

cidrPublicSubnet.Description: An available CIDR block for creating a new VPC. The size of the VPC should be big enough to hold instances of all your golden AMIs at a time
cidrPublicSubnet.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

ApproverUserIAMARN.Description: IAM ARN of the Golden AMI approver. The approver must have AmazonSSMAutomationApproverAccess policy associated with it's IAM Profile .

EmailID.Description: Your email ID for receiving Inspector assessment results and golden AMI creation notification.

instanceType.Description: Specify the the InstanceType compatible with all your golden AMIs. This InstanceType will be used for launching continuous vulnerability assessment of golden AMIs.

continuousInspectionFrequency.Description: Frequency for setting up continuous inspection of your AMIs. For syntax, check - https://docs.aws.amazon.com/lambda/latest/dg/tutorial-scheduled-events-schedule-expressions.html

MetadataJSON.Description: Metadata of accounts and regions for distributing the golden AMI.

roleName.Description: Cross account role suffix for managing Golden AMI metadata Parameters in child account(s). This role needs to exist in each account specified in MetadataJSON parameter.

Content.description: This automation document triggers Golden AMI creation workflow.

sourceAMIid.description: Source/Base AMI to be used for generating your golden AMI

productName.description: The syntax of this parameter is ProductName-ProductVersion.

productOSAndVersion.description: The syntax of this parameter is OSName-OSVersion

AMIVersion.description: Golden AMI Build version number to be created.

subnetId.description: Subnet in which instances will be launched.

securityGroupId.description: Security Group that will be attached to the instance. By Default a security group without any inbound access is attached

instanceType.description: A compatible instance-type for launching an instance

targetAMIname.description: Name for the golden AMI to be created

ApproverUserIAMARN.description: IAM ARN of the user who has SSM approval permissions.

ApproverNotificationArn.description: SNS Topic ARN on which a notification would be published once the golden AMI candidate is ready for validation.

ManagedInstanceProfile.description: Instance Profile. Do not change the default value.

PreUpdateScript.description: (Optional) URL of a script to run before updates are applied. Default ("none") is to not run a script.

PostUpdateScript.description: (Optional) URL of a script to run after package updates are applied. Default ("none") is to not run a script.

IncludePackages.description: (Optional) Only update these named packages. By default ("all"), all available updates are applied.

ExcludePackages.description: (Optional) Names of packages to hold back from updates, under all conditions. By default ("none"), no package is excluded.

GoldenAMIAutomationDoc.Description: The Name of the document that creates Golden AMI and executes Inspector.

SetupContinuousAssessmentLambdaFunction.Description: The Lambda function that initiates the vulnerability assessment.
